title: Giving God The Glory (Dewey Smith)
description:
We’re living proof of what God’s mercies can do.

In “Giving God The Glory,” Dr. Dewey Smith from House Of Hope reminds us that giving God glory requires us to renew our minds and use our daily lives to bring Him praise.

If you’ve just made a decision for Christ, please respond HERE: http://ele.vc/tIepfr

To support this ministry and help us continue to reach people all around the world click here: http://www.elevationchurch.org/giving/

Scripture References:

Romans 12, verses 1-2

Romans 11, verse 36
